sentences.sContent: Stop your wishful thinking and be glad for what you do have instead of always wanting more.
sentences.sContent_eng: Stop your wishful thinking and be glad for what you do have instead of always wanting more.
sentences.sCn: 别再一厢情愿的妄想了，高高兴兴的接受你已经有的，别再奢求更多了。

sentences.sContent: The personal computer might be seen as another example of this wishful alliance of the reversionary and technophiliac visions.
sentences.sContent_eng: The personal computer might be seen as another example of this wishful alliance of the reversionary and technophiliac visions.
sentences.sCn: 个人电脑可以被看作是另一个这种复古和技术狂愿景一厢情愿的联盟的例子。

sentences.sContent: Look to reality instead of relying on wishful thinking.
sentences.sContent_eng: Look to reality instead of relying on wishful thinking.
sentences.sCn: 要着眼现实，而不要依赖一厢情愿的想法。

sentences.sContent: ...Now it turns out that may be wishful thinking...

synos.tran: 渴望的，愿望的；寄予希望的

phrases.pCn: n. 如意算盘；痴心妄想

words.tran: 渴望地；希望地；不满足地
